data.description:
Build confidence with JOB INTERVIEW SIMULATIONS!

A lack of confidence is one of the major reasons why Job Seekers aren't successful in their interviews. With practice interviews, Job Seekers are better prepared and perform confidently in job interviews.  

Refine job interview skills in an immersive practice platform: 

THOUSANDS OF JOBS  
With more positions and industries continually being added 

VARIOUS CAREER PATHS
Variety of career levels from Cashier and Software Developer, to Finance Director

EXPERT-CURATED QUESTIONS
Carefully selected behavioural, situational, and skill-based questions for each interview

VALUABLE FEEDBACK
Full text transcripts, audio recordings, and analytics of interviews for self-improvement

HIGHLY REPLAYABLE EXPERIENCES
Unique scenarios every time to encourage repeated practice

Elevate your career support initiatives by giving Job Seekers the tools they need to succeed!

changelog.change_log: add backtrace so developer can see stacktrace on backend
resolve unable to hear audio and analytics getting stuck in review
resolve end menu getting stuck causing stats to  not appear
Add AI so program provides users example answers to interview questions. User requires to open/close the mic by clicking on the mic
User must agree to consent form before playing the game. Backend will track the date user agreed to the consent form
expand VR maintenance notification bar background and move the text closer to the centre so that the text does not go out of bounds when there are 2 lines of text

when user selects symbols key on symbols keyboard in vr to go back to alphabet keyboard, the alphabet keyboard will display lower case so that the user does not have to select the shift keyboard twice to go from uppercase to lowercase
hotfix add annotations to controller so user knows what the controller is used for
logo center in webgl login. pc overlay icon and text appearing too early.microphone french text too long
Resolve not ablue to build in VR

Release notes
Bug fixes:
 BCJ-1736 Update Idle1 and idle2 animations, removing disabled pen keyframe for the animation
 BCJ-1736 Updated animation for Connie Idle3. Removed key frame for pen disable
 BCJ-1746: Filip character FBX model replaced to fix the 'missing button on jacket' issue
 BCJ-1744: Replaced Danny FBX to fix the hole in jacket issue
 BCJ-1745 Updated Danny clothing texture to used the double sided shader to prevent the issue of seeing the background through the shirt
 BCJ-1526 added generating stats canvas so we can fake a generating stats for audiostorage and snaplog to complete
Improvements:
 BCJ-1392 change quit buttons text to quit simulation to stay consistent with quit confirmation window header. Added confirmation view when select return to lobby and restart interview
Others:
 BCJ-1747 dll update argo 6.1.0.2
Known issues:
 BCJ-1726 No user text or analytics at the end of an interview when user does not respond to any one of the questions
